jacdac.ReflectedLightReg.Brightness:
Read-only ratio u0.16 (uint16_t). Reports the reflected brightness. It may be a digital value or, for some sensor, analog value.
* ```
const [brightness] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u0.16")
```
jacdac.ReflectedLightReg.Variant:
Constant Variant (uint8_t). Type of physical sensor used
* ```
const [variant] = jdunpack<[jacdac.ReflectedLightVariant]>(buf, "u8")
```
modules.ReflectedLightClient: A sensor that detects light and dark surfaces, commonly used for line following robots.
modules.ReflectedLightClient.brightness: Reports the reflected brightness. It may be a digital value or, for some sensor, analog value.
modules.ReflectedLightClient.onBrightnes: Run code when the brightness changes by the given threshold value.
